mapper.select: select num,content,DATE_FORMAT(regdate, "%Y-%m-%d") regdate,num2,id,name,save_name,tb from( select p.photo_com_num num,p.content content,p.regdate regdate,p.photo_num num2,p.id id,m.name name,pro.save_name save_name,'photo' tb from photo_com p join hompy h on h.id=p.id join member m on m.id=h.id join (select * from ( select hompy_num,save_name from profile order by hompy_num, regdate desc ) a group by a.hompy_num) pro on h.hompy_num=pro.hompy_num) a where a.num2=#{num2} order by a.regdate desc limit #{startrow},#{endrow}

select count(*) from( select p.photo_com_num num,p.content content,p.regdate regdate,p.photo_num num2,p.id id,m.name name,pro.save_name save_name,'photo' tb from photo_com p join hompy h on h.id=p.id join member m on m.id=h.id join (select * from ( select hompy_num,save_name from profile order by hompy_num, regdate desc ) a group by a.hompy_num) pro on h.hompy_num=pro.hompy_num) a where a.num2=#{num2} order by a.regdate desc
